text: The number of malls and small shops are overwhelming in a good way. It feels like a so-many-shops-so-little-time/budget kinda thing. ðŸ˜… but happy to have been able to go around the areaâ€¦ happier even to see that they have a Jollibee store! ðŸ‡µðŸ‡­#represent
I went to Lilen fashions for repairing some torn sleeves/haberdashery. Rosalind was very fast and did an excellent job. Very reasonably priced and can't even see the stitching.

It's a bit sad that this shopping complex is now very quiet - especially upstairs.  Lots of shops closed.  Ground floor stores are still mostly open with a few tailors and salons.  The new store Miss Saigon is upstairs with great Vietnamese food.
Orchard BCM is nice  Thai food can skipped.

Old school shopping mall with lots of tailors at the ground floor. There is quite a number of small Japanese bars that look very interesting. Generally a good mix of shops even though there is also an overwhelming number of cosmetic parlours just like in other small shopping malls along Orchard.
